entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
